free.chess
Interface ColoredBoardPainter

All Superinterfaces:
BoardPainter
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultBoardPainter, PlainBoardPainter
public interface ColoredBoardPainter
extends BoardPainter

An extension of the BoardPainter interface which allows setting and retrieving the colors with which the SQUARES are drawn.

Method Summary
 java.awt.Color getDarkColor()
          Returns the color of the dark SQUARES.
 java.awt.Color getLightColor()
          Returns the color of the light SQUARES.
 void setDarkColor(java.awt.Color color)
          Sets the color of the dark SQUARES.

          Sets the color of the light SQUARES.
